Posts.EditableText: I created a turn script that changes an objects alias whenever the flag is set. Although it works, it only updates when the player makes a move themselves and not if the game moves the player. Is there something that can do something like that, without the players input?
Posts.HTML: I created a turn script that changes an objects alias whenever the flag is set. Although it works, it only updates when the player makes a move themselves and not if the game moves the player. Is there something that can do something like that, without the players input?

Posts.EditableText:
Turnscripts run when the player enters a command.

If you want to run a script when the player *moves*, use the `roomenter` script on the game's "Scripts" tab.

If you want to run a script when a flag is set, you might want a changescript.
Posts.HTML:
Turnscripts run when the player enters a command.

If you want to run a script when the player moves, use the roomenter script on the game's "Scripts" tab.

If you want to run a script when a flag is set, you might want a changescript.

Posts.EditableText: how can I use changescripts on a flag?
Posts.HTML: how can I use changescripts on a flag?

Posts.EditableText: If you have a flag called `foo` then a script attribute called `changedfoo` will be run whenever it changes. You can use that script to do whatever you want; although normally you'll want to start with an `if` statement checking if the flag was turned on or off.
